original_title: The Boulet Brothers' Halfway to Halloween TV Special
overview: Hosted by modern day horror hosts and “queens of darkness” The Boulet Brothers, The Boulet Brothers’ Halfway to Halloween TV Special will be a mid-year variety show celebrating the “Halfway to Halloween” season for fans who just can’t wait until October 31 to get a good dose of the dark side.
title: The Boulet Brothers' Halfway to Halloween TV Special
